Package de.bolz.android.taglocate.ui

Class Summary
EditDispatchActivity This class is responsible for calling the right edit activities when referencing a new NFC Tag or QR code.
EditModeOverlay This class is responsible for drawing a crosshairs marker in the view center.
GeometriesSingleton Singleton class that stores a List of GeoPoint arrays.
GMapActivity This is the core activity of the application.
HelpActivity This activity displays the application's HTML help / credits pages.
LocationMarkerOverlay This class is responsible for drawing a location marker on the Map View.
NfcEditActivity Activity that handles referencing NFC tags.
PreferencesActivity This activity provides a user interface to change application settings.
QrEditActivity Activity that handles referencing QR codes.
TagEditActivity Abstract superclass to store common functionality for tag referencing activities.
